rules_text:
When this artifact enters, search your library for a legendary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells or to activate abilities of legendary permanents.
notes: 2.2.0: Changed proficient outfitters text to this so now it’s a noncreature spell. Flavor also feels great.
